summary: This is a character preset for the Ashen race,
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=1]THIS MOD IS A PRESET DESIGNED TO WORK WITH THE LISTED MODS, [NONE OF THEM ARE AVAILABLE ON THIS PAGE[/size]]
[/b]
[color=#cc0000][color=#ffffff]This is a[/color] RaceMenu preset [color=#ffffff]for the[/color] Ashen race by [/color][b][color=#ff0000][color=#cc0000]Seren4XX and RadioRagae[/color] [/color](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8583/?)
[/b]
This preset can work with other races, but to get the intended results it is highly recommended that you use the ashen race,

The hair ([color=#9900ff]Radioreggaes hair workshop 2[/color]) used can also be found here: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=267424761]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=267424761[/url]

[color=#ff7700]Racemenu [/color]by Expired: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?

[color=#6aa84f]SKSE [/color](required)



[color=#ffd966][size=4][u][i][b]INSTALL: [/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]

[b][size=3]5 Easy Steps[/size][/b]

[size=3]1.)Download Required and Recommended mods
2.) Download and Extract my preset
3.)Place into Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
4.)Load Preset in game, modify to your liking
5.)Enjoy :3[/size]

Results may vary depending on your Skyrim mod setup, YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!


[color=#00ffff][size=4][u][i][b]These mods are used in the picture, and are recommended, to receive the best results[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]


[color=#00ff00]Women of Skyrim female face textures by zzjay[/color]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?

[color=#ff00ff]Seductive Lips HD by EcthelionOtW[/color]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?

[color=#6fa8dc]Better Makeup for SKSE [/color](I used the High Res Female Face Makeup for SKSE): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?

[color=#b6b6b6]GlossTech [/color]- Glossify your Skyrim Experience by MonoS94: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5437/?

[color=#d5a6bd]ENB Preset by s3b3k87[/color]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22056/?



[u][b](All Credit goes to the original mod authors and their amazing creations allowing me to bring you this preset.)
[/b][/u]
[color=#ffff00][i]If This mod tickles your fancy, feel free to endorse, this will let me know if i should put out more presets.[/i][/color]
author: Hangster20
